name: Legend of Thatarus
description:
Legend of Tartarus
Is a special type of dungeon crawler.
You have to recruit souls on your way to escape from hell which will then give you effects.
Because you are stronger together!
Manual:
You can control with W, A, S, D. You can shoot with the space bar.
They can recruit souls if you get down on them.
Good luck!
Notrealdevs
Ps:
Sorry for my bad English.
Please vote for our game!
